message.name: ERR_REGISTRAR_INCORRECT_BPOCLASS
message.locale: Business Process class %1s for product of type %2c is not assignable to type %3s.

message.name: ERR_REGISTRAR_NEW_INSTANCE_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: Factory class %1s for product of type %2c does not implement newInstance method.

message.name: ERR_REGISTRAR_HOOK_INSTANTIATION_FAILED
message.locale: Exception instantiating hook for product of type %1c : %2s.

message.name: ERR_REGISTRAR_ISSUE
message.locale: Exception occurred while creating the Evidence Controller Hook Registrar.

message.name: INF_EVIDENCE_PENDING_REMOVAL
message.locale: This evidence is now pending removal.
